SELECT seckill.*, sku.`name` AS storeSkuName, sku.`online_price` AS storeSkuPrice, pic.url AS storeSkuUrl, store.id AS storeId, store.store_name AS storeName, service.product_no productNo FROM
seckill LEFT JOIN
sku ON seckill.store_sku_id = sku.id LEFT JOIN
pic ON sku.id = pic.store_sku_id AND pic.type = 1 LEFT JOIN
store ON sku.store_id = store.id LEFT JOIN goods_store_sku_service service ON service.store_sku_id = sku.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND sku.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND store.store_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND service.product_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND seckill.seckill_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{seckillName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND seckill.seckill_status = #{seckillStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}
ORDER BY seckill.create_time DESC

SELECT seckill.*, sku.`name` AS storeSkuName, sku.`online_price` AS storeSkuPrice, pic.url AS storeSkuUrl, store.id AS storeId, store.store_name AS storeName FROM
seckill LEFT JOIN
sku ON seckill.store_sku_id = sku.id LEFT JOIN
pic ON sku.id = pic.store_sku_id AND pic.type = 1 LEFT JOIN
store ON sku.store_id = store.id WHERE seckill.`id` = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM activity_seckill sec where sec.id = #{activitySeckillId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (sec.seckill_range_type = 0 or exists (select 1 from activity_seckill_range sr where sr.activity_seckill_id = sec.id AND sr.city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )

SELECT sec.id,sec.seckill_name,sec.seckill_alias,sec.seckill_range_type,sec.seckill_status,sec.start_time,sec.end_time, sec.seckill_num,sec.start_num,sec.seckill_price,sec.pic_url,sec.store_sku_id,sec.create_time,sec.create_user_id, sec.update_time,sec.update_user_id,sec.disabled FROM activity_seckill sec,goods_store_sku gss,store_info_ext sie where sec.seckill_status = 1 AND (sec.seckill_range_type = 0 or exists (select 1 from activity_seckill_range sr where sr.activity_seckill_id = sec.id AND sr.city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) AND sec.store_sku_id = gss.id AND gss.store_id = sie.store_id AND sie.is_closed = 1

SELECT sec.id,sec.seckill_name,sec.seckill_alias,sec.seckill_range_type,sec.seckill_status,sec.start_time,sec.end_time, sec.seckill_num,sec.start_num,sec.seckill_price,sec.pic_url,sec.store_sku_id,sec.create_time,sec.create_user_id, sec.update_time,sec.update_user_id,sec.disabled FROM activity_seckill sec,goods_store_sku gss,store_info_ext sie where sec.seckill_status = 1 AND (sec.seckill_range_type = 0 or exists (select 1 from activity_seckill_range sr where sr.activity_seckill_id = sec.id AND sr.city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) AND sec.store_sku_id = gss.id AND gss.store_id = sie.store_id AND sie.is_closed = 1 union SELECT sec.id,sec.seckill_name,sec.seckill_alias,sec.seckill_range_type,sec.seckill_status,sec.start_time,sec.end_time, sec.seckill_num,sec.start_num,sec.seckill_price,sec.pic_url,sec.store_sku_id,sec.create_time,sec.create_user_id, sec.update_time,sec.update_user_id,sec.disabled FROM activity_seckill sec,goods_store_sku gss,store_info_ext sie where (sec.seckill_range_type = 0 or exists (select 1 from activity_seckill_range sr where sr.activity_seckill_id = sec.id AND sr.city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) AND sec.store_sku_id = gss.id AND gss.store_id = sie.store_id AND sie.is_closed = 1 AND sec.start_time = ( SELECT s.start_time FROM activity_seckill s left JOIN activity_seckill_range r on s.id = r.activity_seckill_id WHERE s.seckill_status = 0 and (r.city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR s.seckill_range_type = 0) ORDER BY s.start_time ASC LIMIT 1) AND sec.seckill_status = 0

SELECT se.id,se.store_sku_id,g.online_price as store_sku_price,se.seckill_status,se.start_time,TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(se.end_time,NOW())) as seckill_time_left ,se.seckill_name,se.seckill_num,se.seckill_alias ,se.pic_url,se.seckill_price, ROUND((se.seckill_num-sale.num)/(se.seckill_num+se.start_num),2) as remain_stock_ratio FROM (select count(1) as num from activity_seckill_record ad where order_disabled = 0 and ad.activity_seckill_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR})as sale, `activity_seckill` se , goods_store_sku g WHERE se.store_sku_id = g.id and se.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM activity_seckill sec where sec.seckill_status = 1
AND sec.store_sku_id = #{storeSkuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (sec.seckill_range_type = 0 or exists (select 1 from activity_seckill_range sr where sr.activity_seckill_id = sec.id AND sr.city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )
